snippet: Milan prosecutors have extended their investigation of alleged corruption in Algeria involving Saipem, ENI's oil services subsidiary, as well as to ENI and its chief executive, Paolo Scaroni.

byline.original: By GAIA PIANIGIANI and STANLEY REED

lead_paragraph: Milan prosecutors have extended their investigation of alleged corruption in Algeria involving Saipem, ENI's oil services subsidiary, as well as to ENI and its chief executive, Paolo Scaroni.

headline.main: Italian Oil Giant Caught Up in Corruption Investigation
headline.print_headline: Italian Oil Giant Caught Up in Corruption Investigation
